com.lows
Class ResultListFragment

java.lang.Object
  Fragment
      com.lows.ResultListFragment

public class ResultListFragment
extends Fragment

ListView Fragment which is displayed when LoWS Main Receiver Application starts. All LoWS messages currently found in the vicinity are displayed within this fragment. TODO: The Processing of the searchStrings should be made more flexible for adding new LoWS types.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Sven Zehl

onStop

public void onStop()

displayListView

private void displayListView()
This function is executed when the fragment is loaded the first time. It displays the Scanning in process message.

updateListView

public void updateListView()
This function is called when new scan results were successfully parsed The function is called from the updateResultListFragmentFromActivity() from the LoWSActivity class It updates the ListView with all currently found LoWS in vicinity

onActivityResult

public void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                             int resultCode,
                             Intent data)
This function is called when the user taps the return button for leaving the ClickActivity It is used to process the settings the user did within the ClickActivity, e.g. setting search strings

addRemoveBepsSearchStrings

void addRemoveBepsSearchStrings(boolean alarmSet,
                                LoWS tempLows)
This function is called from onActivityResult() when BEPS notifications should be enabled or disabled, TODO: -this function should be improved when the search and display string management is moved to sqlite.

Parameters:
alarmSet, - true if the BEPS notifications should be turned on
tempLows, - the LoWS which caused the change

addRemoveWtnsSearchStrings

void addRemoveWtnsSearchStrings(boolean alarmSet,
                                LoWS tempLows,
                                java.lang.String searchTextReturn)
This function is called from onActivityResult() when WTN notifications should be enabled or disabled, TODO: -this function should be improved when the search and display string management is moved to sqlite.

Parameters:
alarmSet, - true if a WTN notification should be turned on
tempLows, - the corresponding WTN LoWS for the notification (needed for the room name)
searchTextReturn, - the waiting ticket number for the notification
